name: 9Pay
tagline: Leading Payment Service Provider in Vietnam market that brings valuable solutions to our merchants.
description: 9Pay's sole mission is, by combining technology and payment, to bring diverse and efficient payment solutions to our Merchants and Users. We are not satisfied with the current situation, where payment technology is not yet popular in the Vietnamese market but flourishing in other parts of the world. We hereby offer a better way to accept payments worldwide that leverages both customer experience and your business image.
